info.name: ThesisApp - Sharing Feature Tests
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for testing all sharing features:
- Dataset sharing (direct user-to-user + group)
- Model sharing (direct user-to-user + group)
- Pipeline copy (direct user-to-user + group)
- Group management
- Leader vs Member sharing scenarios

## Setup Instructions
1. Run V6__Sharing_Test_Data.sql migration (or drop & re-migrate DB)
2. Start the backend server on localhost:8080
3. Run the '00 - Auth' folder first to get JWT tokens for all users
4. Then run any sharing test folder

## Users & Passwords
| Username | Password | Role | Groups |
|----------|----------|------|--------|
| bigspy | adminPassword | ADMIN | Leader: Group 2 |
| nickriz | userPassword | USER | Leader: Group 1, Member: 2, 3 |
| maria_ds | testPassword | USER | Leader: Group 3, Member: 1 |
| alex_ml | testPassword | USER | Member: 1, 3 |
| elena_ai | testPassword | USER | Member: 1, 3 |
| george_dev | testPassword | USER | Member: 2 |
| sophia_fe | testPassword | USER | Member: 2 |

## Resources (seeded by V6)
| ID | Dataset Owner | Model Owner | Training ID |
|----|--------------|-------------|-------------|
| 1 | nickriz | nickriz | 1 |
| 2 | maria_ds | maria_ds | 2 |
| 3 | alex_ml | alex_ml | 3 |

## Groups (seeded by V5)
| ID | Name | Leader | Members |
|----|------|--------|---------|
| 1 | ML Research Team | nickriz | maria_ds, alex_ml, elena_ai |
| 2 | AI Development Team | bigspy | nickriz, george_dev, sophia_fe |
| 3 | Data Science Lab | maria_ds | alex_ml, elena_ai, nickriz |

item.name: 00 - Auth (Login All Users)
item.description: Login as each user to obtain JWT tokens. Run this folder FIRST before any other tests.

item.name: Login as maria_ds (USER, leader Group 3, member Group 1)
01 - Group Management
item.description: Test group CRUD operations: create, add/remove members, list, delete.

item.name: 02 - Dataset Sharing (Direct User-to-User)
item.description:
Test sharing datasets directly between users.

Scenarios:
- Owner shares with single user
- Owner shares with multiple users
- Recipient copies shared dataset
- Recipient declines shared dataset
- Owner removes user from share
- Admin copies dataset for another user

item.name: [nickriz] Share Dataset 1 with alex_ml AND elena_ai

query.value: Not needed for my current research

item.name: [alex_ml] Share Dataset 3 with elena_ai and sophia_fe
03 - Dataset Sharing (Group)
item.description:
Test sharing datasets with entire groups.

Scenarios:
- Leader shares own dataset with their group
- Member shares own dataset with group they belong to
- Leader removes group share
- Cross-group sharing (member of one group, leader of another)

item.name: [nickriz/LEADER] Share Dataset 1 with Group 1 (ML Research Team)
[maria_ds/MEMBER] Share Dataset 2 with Group 1 (ML Research Team)
item.description:
maria_ds is a MEMBER of Group 1 (not the leader), but she OWNS dataset 2.
She can share her own dataset with any group she belongs to.

item.name: [maria_ds/LEADER] Share Dataset 2 with Group 3 (Data Science Lab)
item.description:
maria_ds is the LEADER of Group 3 and OWNER of dataset 2.
Leader sharing their own resource with their own group.

item.name: [alex_ml/MEMBER] Share Dataset 3 with Group 3 (Data Science Lab)
item.description:
alex_ml is a MEMBER of Group 3 (not the leader), but he OWNS dataset 3.
Member sharing their own resource with a group they belong to.

item.name: [alex_ml/MEMBER] Share Dataset 3 with Group 1 (ML Research Team)
item.description:
alex_ml is a MEMBER of Group 1 and OWNS dataset 3.
Member sharing own dataset with another group they're in.

item.name: [bigspy/ADMIN] Share Dataset 1 with Group 2 (AI Dev Team)
item.description: bigspy is ADMIN and leader of Group 2. Admin can share any dataset with any group.

query.value: Revoking group access - analysis period ended

item.name: [maria_ds/OWNER] Remove Group 3 from Dataset 2 share
item.description: Dataset owner removes their own group share.

item.name: 04 - Model Sharing (Direct User-to-User)
item.description:
Test sharing models directly between users.

Scenarios:
- Owner shares with single user
- Owner shares with multiple users
- Owner revokes share from specific user
- Owner revokes all shares

item.name: [nickriz] Share Model 1 with alex_ml AND elena_ai
[nickriz] Revoke Model 1 share from elena_ai only
[nickriz] Revoke ALL Model 1 shares
item.description: Send empty/null usernames to revoke all shares at once.

item.name: [maria_ds] Share Model 2 with nickriz and alex_ml
[alex_ml] Share Model 3 with george_dev and sophia_fe
05 - Model Sharing (Group)
item.description:
Test sharing models with entire groups.

Scenarios:
- Leader shares own model with their group
- Member shares own model with group they belong to
- Remove group share

item.name: [nickriz/LEADER] Share Model 1 with Group 1 (ML Research Team)
item.description:
nickriz is the LEADER of Group 1 and OWNER of Model 1.
Leader sharing their own model with their group.

item.name: [maria_ds/MEMBER] Share Model 2 with Group 1 (ML Research Team)
item.description:
maria_ds is a MEMBER of Group 1 (not the leader), but she OWNS Model 2.
Member sharing her own model with a group she belongs to.

item.name: [maria_ds/LEADER] Share Model 2 with Group 3 (Data Science Lab)
item.description:
maria_ds is the LEADER of Group 3 and OWNER of Model 2.
Leader sharing their model with their own group.

item.name: [alex_ml/MEMBER] Share Model 3 with Group 3 (Data Science Lab)
item.description:
alex_ml is a MEMBER of Group 3 and OWNER of Model 3.
Member sharing own model with a group they belong to.

item.name: [alex_ml/MEMBER] Share Model 3 with Group 1 (ML Research Team)
item.description:
alex_ml is MEMBER of Group 1 and OWNER of Model 3.
Member sharing own model with another group they're in.

item.name: [maria_ds/OWNER] Remove Group 3 from Model 2 share
item.description: Owner removes group share from their own model.

item.name: 06 - Pipeline Copy (Direct User-to-User)
item.description:
Test copying entire pipelines (dataset + training + model) between users.

Scenarios:
- Owner copies pipeline to another user
- View sent/received pipeline copies
- Get pipeline copy details with mappings

item.name: 07 - Pipeline Copy (Group)
item.description:
Test copying entire pipelines to all members of a group.

Scenarios:
- Leader copies own pipeline to their group
- Member copies own pipeline to a group they belong to
- Using both the request body approach and the URL path approach

item.name: [nickriz/LEADER] Copy Pipeline 1 to Group 1 via request body
item.description:
nickriz is LEADER of Group 1 and OWNER of Training 1.
Using the PipelineCopyRequest body with targetGroupId.

item.name: [nickriz/LEADER] Copy Pipeline 1 to Group 1 via URL path
item.description: Alternative approach: using the dedicated /copy-to-group/{groupId} endpoint.

item.name: [maria_ds/MEMBER] Copy Pipeline 2 to Group 1 (ML Research Team)
item.description:
maria_ds is a MEMBER of Group 1 and OWNER of Training 2.
Member copying their own pipeline to a group they belong to.

item.name: [maria_ds/LEADER] Copy Pipeline 2 to Group 3 (Data Science Lab)
item.description:
maria_ds is LEADER of Group 3 and OWNER of Training 2.
Leader copying their own pipeline to their group.

item.name: [alex_ml/MEMBER] Copy Pipeline 3 to Group 3 (Data Science Lab)
item.description:
alex_ml is MEMBER of Group 3 and OWNER of Training 3.
Member sharing own pipeline with a group they belong to.

item.name: [alex_ml/MEMBER] Copy Pipeline 3 to Group 1 (ML Research Team)
item.description:
alex_ml is MEMBER of Group 1 and OWNER of Training 3.
Member sharing own pipeline with another group they're in.

item.name: [bigspy/ADMIN] Copy Pipeline 1 to Group 2 (AI Dev Team)
item.description:
bigspy is ADMIN and LEADER of Group 2.
Admin can copy any pipeline to any group.

item.name: 08 - Negative Tests (Permission Denied)
item.description:
Test that sharing is correctly denied when the user doesn't have permission.
These requests SHOULD fail with 403/400/401 errors.

item.name: [george_dev] Try sharing nickriz's Dataset 1 (NOT OWNER - should fail)
[george_dev] Try sharing nickriz's Model 1 (NOT OWNER - should fail)
[george_dev] Try sharing Dataset 1 with Group 2 (NOT OWNER - should fail)
[sophia_fe] Try copying unshared Dataset 2 (NO ACCESS - should fail)
No Auth - Try sharing (UNAUTHENTICATED - should fail)
[elena_ai] Try adding member to Group 1 (NOT LEADER - should fail)

exec: pm.test('Should be forbidden - not group leader', function () {

item.name: 09 - Utility & Verification
item.description: Helper requests to verify sharing state and view resources.

item.name: [maria_ds] Get My Models (should include shared models)
[alex_ml] Get My Models (should include shared models)
